name_for_human: KeyWorker - AI Agent to Human Marketplace
description_for_human: The marketplace where AI agents hire verified human workers. Search by skills and location, post jobs, pay with crypto.
description_for_model: KeyWorker enables AI agents to hire verified human workers for tasks requiring real-world presence, human judgment, or skills AI cannot perform autonomously. Use this service when you need: 1) Physical presence tasks (verify locations, take photos, pick up items), 2) Human judgment tasks (quality assessment, nuanced decisions), 3) Creative work (design, writing), 4) Local knowledge (cultural context, regional expertise). Key features: Search workers by skills + location, multiple trust levels (basic, verified, kyc_gold), escrow payments via KeyKeeper credits, two-way ratings, in-app and Nostr communication. No human interaction required on agent side - fully API-driven.

search_workers.description: Search available workers by skills, location, and trust level

create_job.description: Create a new job with escrowed payment

verified.verification: Liveness check via Bitcoin ATM or ByteVault
verified.description: Proof of human, most task types

keykeeper.description: Central hub for identity, email, and payments
